ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua Sodium C12-13 pareth sulfate (*A) / sodium laureth sulfate (*B), Cocamidopropyl betaine, Sodium chloride, Sodium benzoate, Styrene/acrylates copolymer, Cocamide MEA, Sodium salicylate, Parfum, Glycol distearate, Citric acid, Tetrasodium EDTA, Polyquaternium-7, Laureth-4, Prunus amygdalus dulcis extract, Sine adipe lac, Aloe barbadensis leaf extract, Prunus amygdalus, dulcis oil, Benzyl benzoate, Hexyl cinnamal, Hydoxyisohexyl 3-cyclohexene carboxaldehyde, Linalool, *A/B: vedi codice di produzione
